name: @fabcotech/rchain-token
description: Fungibles and non-fungibles tokens on the RChain blockchain

scripts.test: npm run test test:fungibles && npm run test:non-fungibles
scripts.test:all: npm run test:ft && npm run test:nft && npm run test:parallelwithdraws && npm run test:parallelswaps && npm run test:credit
scripts.dappy:namesystem: node cli deploy --fungible false --contract-id dappynamesystem && node cli create-purse --new-id 0 --quantity 100000000 && node cli update-purse-price --price 6ycrev,50000000 --purse-id 0
scripts.dappy:namesystemanddefaults: npm run dappy:namesystem && node cli create-purse --purses-file name-purses.json

author: FABCO
